traits.name: Burning Fury
entries: When the salamander takes fire damage, its Freezing Breath automatically recharges.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The salamander makes five attacks: four with its claws and one with its bite.

actions.name: Claws
entries: Melee atk +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 8 (1d6 + 5 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +9 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 9 (1d8 + 5 damage) piercing damage and 5 (1d10 damage) cold damage.

actions.name: Freezing Breath {@recharge}
entries: The salamander exhales chill wind in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw, taking 44 (8d10 damage) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
